item.title: How Badly Can You Win a Tennis Match?
When to Bring Out Your Kicker (Or Runningback) on 4th & Goal
item.description: In November 2023, Texans running back Dare Ogunbowale attempted a field goal in a real NFL game. I wanted to figure out whether or not this was the right move, so I made a win probability calculator for 4th and Goal situations that could be applied to that game and any others.
